summary: This mod adds two potential new followers to the Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood. These characters are named Juhra & Inphelius and are inspired by my brother and I. Please note that this is no grand mod as this was just me learning how to mod Skyrim, either way I hope you enjoy the mod if you decided to download it!
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds two potential new followers to the Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood. These characters are named Juhra & Inphelius and are inspired by my brother and I. Please note that this is no grand mod as this was just me learning how to mod Skyrim, either way I hope you enjoy the mod if you decided to download it!    
  
  
The background of these characters will be explained once I learn to make the quests for them, as for now you can just freely ask for either of them to help you.  
  
[b][i]Both followers will level with you![/i][/b]
  
[u][b]Juhra[/b][/u]
-Argonian  
-Masters in Sneak & Marksman  
  
[b][u]Inphelius [/u][/b] 
-Khajiit  
-Masters in Sneak & One-handed  
  
As of right now, neither NPC can be married. Next update will have quests involved with the characters.
author: Juhrassick
